context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: I have visited Dr Anil and his wife Shikha at least on 10 different dental issues and find them both extremely friendly and very professional. They are both extremely skilled doctors and very reasonable . The best part is they always explain the problem and then proceed with the fix from a long term perspective. *** ** *** **** ****** ******* ** ******
reply_text: Thank you Mr. Praveen for your kind words and feedback. Much appreciate it.üôè

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** **** ** * **** **** ******* a true professional who knows his job pretty well.
He is very particular about the material he is going to use, I was told in detail about the artificial cap that I was going to get.
One quality that Dr. Anil has is that he doesn't finish the work, until and unless he is completely satisfied with the asthetics of it. 
God bless him and his work - always.
Thanks a lot - Dr Anil.
reply_text: Much appreciate your kind words. Thank you so much.

tags: Value for money,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Anil turned out to be an amazing doctor and more than that an amazing doctor. he guided me through my wisdom tooth extraction which had cavity and was bothering me for quite some time. Him along with his wife Dr. Shikha, helped me on priority and found me a great oral surgeon to help me get rid of the pain and teeth. This was the first time I had any dental procedure done and I was scared. I don't think I will refer to any other doctor now.
